title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste doston! Aaj main aap sabse apni kala yatra ke bare mein baat karna chahti hoon.
Anushka: Bachpan mein, rangon se bada lagav tha. Deewaron pe bhi painting bana deti thi!
Anushka: School mein, art class sabse favourite thi. Teacher hamesha encourage karti thi.
Anushka: Phir zindagi mein kayi distractions aaye, padhai, career. Kala kahin peeche chhoot gayi.
Anushka: Lockdown mein, jab sab ghar par the, toh mujhe phir se painting yaad aayi.
Anushka: Dhool jhami hui brushes nikali, aur canvas par rang bikher diye.
Anushka: Pehla sketch thoda ajeeb tha, lekin mujhe maza aaya!
Anushka: Dheere-dheere practice se, meri art behtar hoti gayi. Ab main commissions bhi leti hoon!
Anushka: Meri kala yatra jaari hai. Ye ek endless journey hai, aur main har pal enjoy karti hoon.
Anushka: Aap bhi try karo! Shayad aapke andar bhi koi chupa hua artist ho. Dhanyavaad!
